column1:
CDC (@CDCemergency) confirms US case of #coronavirus (#2019nCoV) in Seattle, WA; person visited Wuhan, China. 

Meanwhile, Chinese authorities have imposed a quasi-quarantine around Wuhan; a city of 11 million. 

𝗙𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗼𝘄 @BrandonBeckham_ for updates
